titleStmt.title: Mr. Fitz-Harris (now prisoner in the Tower) his case truly stated; humbly offered to the free-holders of England, why he ought to be tried by a jury of his neighbours, and not by the House of Peers; in a letter to Mr. C.L.C F.S. and B.H. greeting.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed for John Smith in Great Queen-street,

notesStmt.note: Printer and publication date from colophon.
Reproduction of the original in the Bodleian Library.
